portfolio.description: A full-stack developer and computer science student with experience building end-to-end web and mobile applications. Creating software with focus on usability, performance, and scalability that is easy to maintain.

experience.description: I work across both the technical and design sides of product development, contributing to mobile deployment integration, frontend development and design, and AI agent creation. Iâ€™ve refined intelligent agent behavior through prompt engineering and prototyping in collaboration with the AI team. On the design side, I translate ideas into structured Figma mockups and participate in cross-functional meetings to align design with implementation. My role bridges development, AI functionality, and UX design to ensure smooth deployment and a cohesive user experience.

I specialized in translating complex prompts into effective, secure, and well-structured code across languages such as Python, Java, C/C++, C#, and JavaScript. I focus on training and fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) with an emphasis on clarity, correctness, and robustness of their outputs. My work involves writing thorough test cases to validate performance and ensure the reliability of model-driven solutions.

I teach block-based programming and robotics to elementary students using platforms like VEX Go and Cubelets. I lead after-school classes of up to 20 students, designing hands-on coding challenges that introduce core programming concepts like logic, debugging, and structured thinking in a fun and engaging way.
